name: ElasticBeanstalkSourceConfigurationPropertyType
description: Use settings from another Elastic Beanstalk configuration template for the AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::ConfigurationTemplate resource type.

properties.name: ApplicationName
properties.desc: The name of the Elastic Beanstalk application that contains the configuration template that you want to use.

properties.name: TemplateName
properties.desc: The name of the configuration template.
